title: Crashing in character select screen
body: Ever since 6.14 went live I have been getting occasional crashes when choosing character bans.   Even though I have been kicked from the game lobby it still punishes me as if I left purposefully.  It always happens just as I hit the ban button and the LOL client completely freezes and my only option is to alt ctrl del.

replies.body: After a match is accepted, the server grabs everyone in the group and places them into champion select together.  It sounds like your network is unable to maintain a connection, causing you to lose sync and leaving you behind.   As Rineyy suggested, the[ troubleshooting connections ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)article will have instructions to help resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Likely due to an unstable connection with the LoL servers. [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
